title: Creamy vegan mushroom risotto
ingredients: ['1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons herbes de Provence', '525ml vegetable stock, or as needed, divided', '200g white mushrooms, sliced', '50g chopped leek', '225g Arborio rice', '240ml soya milk', '1 tablespoon white wine vinegar', '150g frozen peas', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons nutritional yeast', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']
